location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The map accompanies letter from the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) to the India Office, dated 10 January 1934 (folio 217).The map shows Sitra [Sitrah] Island, and adjacent parts of Bahrain, including Muharrak [Muharraq] and Manama.Line from Gathering System to Tanks marked with yellow dotted line; pipeline from Pump House and Control Valves, and Tanks, to Ships' Anchorage marked with solid red line.Scale 35mm = 5,000 feet.
